text: The Brick Ltd. is a Canadian company that sells furniture, appliances, and electronics. They are headquartered in Edmonton, Alberta. The company was first created by John, Fred, and Bill Comrie as The Brick Warehouse LP in 1971. They first opened a store on September 1, 1971. They have stores in every province and territory in Canada except Nunavut. Dave Freeman was the president of The Brick from 1971 until his retirement on December 31, 2023. Darci Walker took over as president on January 1, 2024. In March 2004, they bought United Furniture Warehouse. On November 11, 2012, Leon's bought The Brick for $700 million. == References == ==Other website== * Category:1971 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Alberta Category:Furniture retailers of Canada
